item.description:
CW's Chops and Catch is one of my favorite restaurants.  They are doing a four-course wine dinner for only $50.00!!  (At Max's you'll pay $85.00 to $110.00, at Mill on the River it's $75.00 to $90.00). The food served here rivals the best eateries of the Hartford area. 

The first wine dinner we went to was great!  I didn't think onions, fruit and salmon together sounded good, but somehow chef Corey made it taste wonderful, as well as the rest of the meal. He pairs some unique taste combinations with some above average "standard" foods at his restaurant using fresh, local ingredients.

If you RSVP "YES", do not cancel or change it after 8:00pm 11/4/11, as this is a reservation by invitation only! You must show up if you have said you will come.

Take a look at the menu:

Cocktail Hour:
Assorted Passed Hors D’ourves
Hosmer Root Beer Ribs
Fried Deviled Eggs
*Jonathan Edwards 2010 Connecticut Pinot Gris
*Jonathan Edwards 2010 Connecticut Cabernet Franc

First Course:
Lobster Pierogies with Roasted Shitake Mushrooms, Dried Corn Puree,
Fish Family Farm Queso Fresco
*Jonathan Edwards 2010 Connecticut Chardonnay

Second Course:
Roasted Botticello Farm’s Pumpkin Bisque,
Chilled Duck Spring Roll, Sherry syrup
*Jonathan Edwards 2010 Napa Valley Zinfandel

Third Course:
Veal Weinersnitzel with Herbed Spatzle,
Creme Fraiche Red Cabbage or Crab Cake ‘Rockafella’ (crab claw),
Crispy CT Blue Point Oyster, Bernaise Creamed Spinach, Crisp Slab Bacon
*Jonathan Edwards 2008 Napa Valley Petite Sirah

Fourth Course:
Warm Banana Foster Bread Pudding with Royal Ice Cream (vanilla)
*Jonathan Edwards Dark (Port Style Wine)

Hosmer, Botticello Farms, Royal Ice Cream are all in Manchester, CT  Fish Farm is in Bolton.

 Join me for a terrific night of food and wine.  I will not be collecting the $1.00 tonight.

- Betsy

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: CW'S CHOPS N CATCH Wine Dinner 11/7/11 @ 6:30pm
